name: test-template
postCreateCommand: uv venv .venv && . .venv/bin/activate && if [ -f requirements.txt ]; then uv pip install -r requirements.txt; fi && if [ -f requirements-dev.txt ]; then uv pip install -r requirements-dev.txt; fi
postStartCommand: git config --global --add safe.directory /workspaces/test-template || true && pre-commit install || true
